**7. Distribution of Proceeds:** After all claims are verified and prioritized, the proceeds from asset sales are distributed to creditors in order of priority.

**8. Legal & Tax Compliance:** Ensure all legal and tax requirements are met. This includes filing final tax returns, dissolving the business entity, and complying with any remaining regulations.

**9. Final Closure:** Officially close the business entity with the relevant government agencies.
